summary: Western story about a defiant wife who leaves her husband to take up riding with outlaws.
cast: Burt Reynolds|Sarah Miles|Lee J. Cobb|Jack Warden|George Hamilton|Bo Hopkins|Robert Donner|Sandy McPeak|Larry Littlebird|Nancy Malone|Jay Silverheels|Jay Varela|Owen Bush|Larry Finley|Sutero García Jr.|James Hampton
title: El hombre que amó a Cat Dancing
